messages.subject: New Jersey, and a touching need

messages.messageBody:
http://www.unschooling.com/discus/messages/3583/1842.html?ThursdayJanuary27200
50840am#POST113162


If there's anyone from New Jersey here or who knows their laws, could you
please go here and encourage this mom? Her post is just so vibrant and I don't
have a NJ clue. She wrote this, but didn't leave an address. I'll send her
the link to how to find locals, too, but something about this just yoinked my
heartstrings, y'know?:

By wedsing on Thursday, January 27, 2005 - 08:40 am:
This all sounds too good to be true. I have Rheumatoid Arthritis, however, I
take my 12 yr old daughter to museums, lots of cultural trips (I grew up in
New York and didn't take advantage of these opportunities - didn't know they
existed until I moved to New Jersey 20 years ago!)

Lindsay has been exposed to a critical environment since the 1st grade. She
became unrecognizable in the 7th grade (currently) I am going to begin
unschooling for 8th grade. Wish I could begin now!

Has anyone begun homeschooling in the midst of a school year?

Candee

===========================

Thanks,

Sandra
